MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Dee Valley Court, Bowers Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:09PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault with the overhead cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:02PM on 12TH April 2021
